short_summary: Provide Firewood Processor and Feeding Table to Canada to Process Firewood for Campgrounds.
description: Canada is seeking Offers from Offerors to provide a Firewood Processor and a Feeding Table to help process firewood for our campgrounds. Campers and visitors at Fundy National burn on average250 cords of firewood per season.",
full_summary:
***Government Tender Announcement for a Firewood Processor and Feeding Table***
================================================

**Reference Number:** WS4246865601 - Doc4361042774
**Solicitation Number:** WS4246865601
**Amendment Number:** 1

**Publication Date:** December 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 8, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 15, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2023 (completed)

**Tender Description:**

The Government of Canada invites qualified Offerors to submit a proposal to provide a Firewood Processor and Feeding Table for the Parks Canada Agency. The contractor will be responsible for the delivery and installation of the equipment at various campgrounds within the region. The successful Offeror will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Background:**

The Parks Canada Agency requires a reliable and efficient system to process firewood for its campgrounds. On average, 250 cords of firewood are burned per season. The Agency is seeking a Firewood Processor and Feeding Table that can meet this demand.

**Bid Process:**

This tender is a competitive solicitation based on the lowest price. Bidders may submit their proposals electronically through the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18320621?extsite=MTgzMjA2MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) platform.

**Post-Tender Procedure:**

Bidders who do not receive a contract award may request a debriefing with the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of being notified of their unsuccessful bid.

**Required Deliverables:**

The successful Offeror will be responsible for delivering and installing the Firewood Processor and Feeding Table at the specified locations.

**Contact Information:**

For more information and to respond to this tender, please visit [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18320621?extsite=MTgzMjA2MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or contact [Shawn Trahan](mailto:shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

====================================================
